summary: Hentai's Lili armour converted to bodyslide
descriptionHtml:
There's nothing much to it, I'm a big fan of Emili de Rochefort from Tekken and I wondered how there wasn't an armour mod for her in Skyrim. Turns out there was, but only in UNPB (which I do not use). So basically I decided to make my own conversion and take it as an opportunity to learn how to use the software a little bit. Eventually I did it and then decided to give it my own personal flair ;P (Basically a slutty version without the bottom skirt)
 
The mod includes a dress, gauntlets, boots, and a slutty version of the dress + Bodyslide files.
 
Installation - Just copy and paste the contents into your Skyrim Data folder and hope for the best [img]http://www.loverslab.com/public/style_emoticons/default/biggrin.png[/img]

How to obtain - Type in 'Help Lili 4' (without the ' ) in console to get the armour id, then 'player.additem *whatever the id is* *quantity you want* '
I'll add in a better way to get the good stuff later on when I'm not bogged down by university crap :) 
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Credit where credit is due -
*Hentai for the original Oblivion armour.
*Halo for the UNPB version
*Xuniana for the follower mod I ripped the armour from (special thanks) [img]http://www.loverslab.com/public/style_emoticons/default/tongue.png[/img]
author: M4ltes3r
